Parameters: The point on the ground (projected from the screen point) that was pressed.
onMapLongClick(com.google.android.gms.ma.Description: Called when the user makes a long-press gesture on the map, but only if none of the overlays of the map handled the gesture. Implementations of this method are always invoked on the main thread.

ClassDesc: Callback interface for when the user long presses on the map. Listeners will be invoked on the main thread.
